name: Tumbleweed (huangbwhhh)
description:
This is a contribution to the ID@XBOX game design contest,made by a four-people group made up of me and my classmate.We have a Western move fan,a shooter game lover,so we finally set up the theme at an ACT party game inspired by Mccree's revolver.We wanted to create a FPS alike feeling when firing,so we really worked on different feeling of different guns.In addition,we choose to use two triggers on controller as the input fire and reload,which could simulate revolver's fire in burst by pulling the trigger quickly.
This is a work to show our respect to classic shooting game.We put lots of humorous details in,like the cowboy hat could be your bulletproof armour,but wearing too much hat at one time may cause you stuck.And  randomly generated items and some map machanism also made the game more fun.
